ServiceSid.description: The SID of the [Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/rest/service-resource) to delete the Member resource from.

ChannelSid.description: The SID of the [Channel](https://www.twilio.com/docs/chat/channels) the Member resource to delete belongs to. This value can be the Channel resource's `sid` or `unique_name`.

Sid.description: The SID of the Member resource to delete. This value can be either the Member's `sid` or its `identity` value.
